BEFORE:
x = self.conv_exp(x)
        xs, xb = x.chunk(2, dim=1)
        xb = self.blocks(xb)
        out = self.conv_transition(torch.cat([xs, self.conv_transition_b(xb)], dim=1))
AFTER:
x = self.conv_exp(x)
        split = x.shape[1] // 2
        xs, xb = x[:, :split], x[:, split:]
        xb = self.blocks(xb)
        xb = self.conv_transition_b(xb).contiguous()
        out = self.conv_transition(torch.cat([xs, xb], dim=1))
